mapper.select: SELECT d.`id`,d.`releaseId`,d.`statusId`,d.`refusedMessage`,d.`createTime`,d.`updateTime`,d.`sfId`,d.`orderId` ,r.`title` AS realTitle,r.`nickName` AS realName,de.`name` AS sfName FROM `tb_distribution` AS d INNER JOIN `tb_user_release` AS r ON d.releaseId = r.id INNER JOIN `tb_user_detail` AS de ON d.sfId = de.`id` limit #{pageCurrentNo},#{pageSize}
